title: Caller breaks through when on another call.
content:
This just started happening. I'm on a call and another call comes in, rings through, and disconnects my first caller. It's really annoying. I'm using a Pixel2 XL, Android version 10. Is anyone else having this issue? Is it just a setting that needs to be adjusted or is it a problem with the Android 10 update?
Thanks for any help you can provide.
